content: a quick and easy crochet pattern for a mini brain toy use them as halloween decorations fidget toys worry pets or gifts for back-to-school or exam time these little brains are perfect for over-thinkers size using medium worsted weight yarn and a 3 5 mm e crochet hook your brain will be about 6 cm 2 4 in long and 5 cm 2 in wide however exact gauge is not important for this project and you can adjust the size by using thicker or thinner yarn materials needed not included with purchase medium worsted weight yarn in body colour about 30 m / 33 yds 3 5 mm e crochet hook yarn needle sewing needle black sewing thread 6 mm black beads for eyes
